author: Source: Thanh Nein News
title: Homeland Security websites vulnerable to cyber attack: audit - Thanh Nein News
text:
A U.S. Department of Homeland Security employee works in front of a U.S. threat level map and monitoring display inside the National Cybersecurity and Communications Integration Center during a guided media tour in Arlington, Virginia June 26, 2014. The U.S. department charged with protecting government computers needs to secure its own information systems better, according to an audit released on Tuesday that showed lapses in internal systems used by the Secret Service and Immigration and Customs Enforcement.
 Thanh Nein News.
